index.textoIndex1: Etnothecarium-Botica Natural is a private company that, being aware of the problems that affect the health service and the difficulties suffered by some sectors of the population to treat different diseases and pains, has seen in the study of plants with medicinal properties and nutritional an option that contributes to the improvement of the quality of life of the population, under a concept of inclusive commercialization.
index.textoIndex5Section2: Our social and environmental commitment has as a pillar education as a means of transformation to a more equitable, inclusive, tolerant and respectful society with our environment.
index.textoIndex3Section4: If you want more information or want to be part of our project do not hesitate to write us.
index.modalFeatures1text: We work on the dissemination of the medicinal and responsible use of Cannabis, reaching all social spheres, with the help of our allies Cannabica Civic Culture, Association of Medical Marijuana Users of Ibagu√© and Vital Synergies. Contact us if you want to know more about the medicinal properties of Cannabis.
index.modalFeatures2text: We have highly qualified personnel with investigative experience. Our projects have a social base aimed at the recovery of traditional knowledge of plants with therapeutic, cosmetic and nutritional properties, making use of the benefits offered by Colombia as a pluricultural and mega-diverse country.
index.modalFeatures3text: Good cultivation practices are our permanent commitment, which is why we use completely organic, sustainable and environmentally friendly techniques.
index.modalFeatures4text: We promote regional development through the creation of high-quality labor alternatives in an inclusive project made up of qualified and vulnerable population as mothers head of families, ethnic minorities and victims of the armed conflict.

products.textoZona0: We produce resins with high quality standards. Our strategic alliance with legalized small growers allows us to use selected Cannabis flowers, grown under organic and sustainable conditions. To obtain the secondary metabolites of the plants, we use extraction processes as a supercritical fluid with CO2, Soxhlet and assisted microwave. Finally, the derivatives are analyzed with gas chromatography to determine the content of cannabinoids, terpenes, pesticides and residual solvents and thus meet the needs of our customers.
products.textoZona1: Made from a fine selection of Cannabis varieties to ensure an optimal relationship between the concentration of cannabinoids / terpenes and the desired therapeutic effect. Our extract has demonstrated excellent potential to mitigate the effects caused by different neurodegenerative diseases, epilepsies, cancers, body aches, insomnia, loss of appetite and as a palliative in response to different treatments.
products.textoZona2: Our ointment is designed to act directly, quickly and efficiently; Its powerful combination of plant extracts generates a feeling of well-being and relaxation while its active compounds are released and diffused through the epithelial tissues activating different mechanisms, among them, the Endocannabinoid system having special effect to mitigate the systems caused by different diseases such as : arthritis, osteoarthritis, sciatica, pains caused by anti-cancer therapies, sprains, and strokes.
products.textoZona3: As a result of the extraction of compounds from different aromatic and medicinal plants we present our herbal oil, especially for sessions of muscle relaxation, in addition to moisturizing your skin, nourishes it with different vitamins, amino acids and antioxidants that will protect you from excess free radicals and will keep The optimal balance that your tissues need, also has the ability to stimulate the Endocannabinoid system increasing the analgesic, relaxing and protective power.
products.textoZona4: Our balms create a sensation of freshness and well-being, keep your lips soft, hydrated and protected from UV radiation, while renewing them so they look healthier. Made from 100% natural products and with high quality standards to guarantee your well-being.
products.textoZona5: Artisanal hydroalcoholic extraction of a group of plants with aromatic and medicinal properties widely used in traditional medicine. This herbal combination in synergy with Cannabis flowers, provides you with the best of natural medicine through its analgesic and anti-inflammatory properties, for a quick relief of joint pain, muscle pain, contractures and headaches, among others; without forgetting its pleasant aroma and relaxing effects.
products.textoZona6: They seek to satisfy the individual need of a particular patient, in relation to one or more medications that are not found in the national market and that in the judgment of the attending physician should be used in pharmacotherapy. These preparations can be handled in any type of pharmaceutical form taking into account the active principle and the site of action thereof.
products.tituloInvitacion: Do you want to know more ?

about.textoSection1: Etnothecarium-Botica natural was born with the reunion of a group of friends after appreciating the Colombian problem during the completion of their postgraduate studies abroad. These reflections led to the establishment of a company that seeks to contribute to the economic growth of the country and the improvement of health, through the transformation of plants with therapeutic and nutritional properties, making use of the opportunities offered by Colombia as a mega-diverse country. and multicultural. Thus, the ethnographic, legal and natural sciences meet in a business project capable of transmitting this information to the productive sectors in an inclusive and sustainable manner.
about.textoSection2: Etnothecarium-Botica natural is a private company that seeks to contribute to the well-being of the community through the improvement and promotion of health, rescuing the ethnobotanical knowledge of a pluricultural and mega-diverse country, promoting research, development and sustainability of medicinal and cosmetic products derived from plants with therapeutic properties.
about.textoSection3: Etnothecarium-Botica natural seeks to position itself in 2019 as a leading company in the national and international market of plant-based products with therapeutic properties, using cutting-edge technologies such as methods of extraction of steam entrainment and supercritical fluid, in addition to solid programs of investigation. By the year 2021, we seek to establish ourselves as an important employment generating company for the region, promoting the retention of qualified personnel, within a framework of inclusion and pluriculturalism as mothers head of families, ethnic minorities and demobilized members of armed groups from all regions of Colombia.
about.textoSection4: To elaborate and offer medicinal products and cosmetics based on plants with aromatic and therapeutic properties through the creation of a laboratory of extraction and processing of fats and oils of natural origin in the department of Tolima and the departments of the coffee axis.
about.textoCarousel1: Achieve commercial positioning at the regional level as a consolidation platform in national and international markets.
about.textoCarousel2: Guarantee sustainability and respect for the environment by adopting all protocols for the management of waste or hazardous waste.
about.textoCarousel3: Guarantee Good Management Practices in all our processes.
about.textoCarousel4: Promote regional development through science and technology, as well as the generation of decent and inclusive employment that contributes to the search for social equity in post-conflict times.
about.textoSection6Zona1: The war against drug trafficking originated in the United States (USA) in the 70s condemned the consumption of plants and their derivatives with euphoric properties, in exchange for the misfortune of other countries. However, at present there is a strong anti-prohibitionist tendency which, paradoxically, has gained strength in this same country. An example of this has been the medicinal and recreational use of marijuana whose acceptance has been defined by popular vote in different US states. Thus, Cannabis has become an important source of job creation and taxes, making the states of Colorado and Washington a reference for countries that have taken up the challenge of Cannabis regulation, among these Colombia.
about.textoSection6Zona2: The signature in Colombia of Law 1787 of June 6, 2017, allows the use of Cannabis for medicinal and scientific purposes that, in synchrony with the growing trend of alternative medicines and natural products, allows to see in the phytotherapeutic market a promising alternative for economic development and dignifying health. Some of these plants have had direct participation in the armed conflict as one of the main sources of financing for illegal armed groups. Therefore, it is of the utmost importance to develop educational strategies to show the benefits and potential of plants with therapeutic and nutritional properties, including Cannabis, and thus contribute to the wellbeing of the population, through the generation of jobs and decent health.

about.textonInfoCarousel2: Lawyer; Master in Anthropology, PhD in Legal Sciences; She is currently a professor and researcher at the University of Caldas.
about.textonInfoCarousel3: Businessman and owner of the firm Tobar Enterprises Inc and Global insurances and associates based in Georgia.
about.textonInfoCarousel4: Chemist Farmaceut; He has over 10 years of experience in analytical chemistry with an emphasis in narcotics, forensic toxicology and BPL in oncology.

research.textoSection1:
Etnothecarium-Botica natural has qualified personnel and research experience in the areas of legal, human and natural sciences.
Our research projects have a social base aimed at the recovery of traditional knowledge of plants with therapeutic, cosmetic and nutritional properties, making use of the benefits offered by Colombia in its capacity as a pluricultural and mega-diverse country.
This knowledge is complemented with elements of science and modern technology to offer natural products with high quality standards, under an inclusive marketing concept.
research.textoZona2: Thus, the plant material used to obtain our resins and extracts come from completely organic crops that respect the environment. Cannabis flowers are obtained from mixed cultivation techniques in controlled conditions (interior) and natural (exterior); this methodology allows to evaluate production and yield of each lot, besides evaluating physiological processes like adaptation and response (phenotypic plasticity) of the non-cannabis varieties of Cannabis to environmental conditions of tropical bands.
research.textoZona3: The plant material is extracted, purified and transformed by steam traction and high pressure techniques in sub and supercritical conditions. We rule out the use of hydrocarbon derived solvents as they are highly volatile and hazardous to health.
research.textoZona4: The quality of the vegetal material, identification of secondary metabolites and the quantification of extracts and resins, among others, are analyzed using gas chromatography (GC) coupled to a mass detector (MS); In addition, we have stability studies, physicochemical analysis of raw material, active principles and microbiological analysis. Stability studies, evaluation of the raw material and validation of our processes are maximized by response surface analysis.
research.textoZona4Content: The improvement of the productive processes, as well as the development of new pharmaceutical and cosmetic formulas have been carried out with the scientific and technological support of our strategic alliances with Biota and Global Insurances.
